name: parcel-multi
description: Minimum viable Vue app with Parcel Bundler
author: Rohit Rai <rohitkrai03@gmail.com>

scripts.dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development BUILD_MODE=dev parcel src/enter.html --out-dir static
scripts.build: cross-env NODE_ENV=production BUILD_MODE=dev parcel build src/enter.html --no-minify --out-dir static --public-url /twl/static && node build.js
scripts.build:test: cross-env NODE_ENV=production BUILD_MODE=test parcel build src/enter.html --out-dir static --public-url /twl/static && cross-env BUILD_MODE=test node build.js
scripts.build:prod: cross-env NODE_ENV=production BUILD_MODE=prod parcel build src/enter.html --out-dir static --public-url /twl/static && cross-env BUILD_MODE=prod node build.js
